_header: Though Jesu Christ on earth was
_description: ‘De Muliere Samaritana’ — seventy-seven lines in couplets

OxfJesus29.First Lines:
Þo ihesu crist an eorþe was mylde weren his dedeAlle heo
                    beoþ on boke iwryten þat me may heom rede…
OxfJesus29.Last Lines:
…And þus was þes bureuh a red vt of helle soreAnd by
                    leuede on al myhty god nuwe & euer more
